Summary: 4 times the brightes star in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting down outside my house in the porch with a friend. i looked up at the sky and saw a light over head this medical building that is located next to where i live. I got up because i thought it was strange to see that it was getting brighter. It looked like it was getting closer but it wasn't so at that moment i see a plane. I knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter also it was stationed in the air not moving at all .Then it started to dim and disappeared. As soon as it was over i was shocked an couldn't believe what i saw so i called my friend to come over where i was standing. i told him what happened and he just said yeah right your seeing things. but to our suprise another one came out next to where the other one was at and did the same thing the other light did. now both of us are shocked and excited and after a half an hour planes high high up in the sky started to show up around that area .
